name: tiered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a particular number of tiers (= layers or levels ): a two-tiered structure a three-tiered cake See
tier
More examplesFewer examplesThis 3-tiered steamer set is ideal for cooking vegetables.I hope we finally allow a 2-tiered system to flourish.a 4-tiered box filled with exotic chocolates

Add to word list
used to describe a financial product, interest rate, etc. that has two or more possible levels: Savings rates are tiered from 2.25 percent to 3 percent for over €250,000.
